abstract: A conversation with Karl Gerth, an Oxford professor and the author of “As China Goes, So Goes the World: How Chinese Consumers Are Transforming Everything.”
snippet: A conversation with Karl Gerth, an Oxford professor and the author of “As China Goes, So Goes the World: How Chinese Consumers Are Transforming Everything.”
lead_paragraph: In “As China Goes, So Goes the World: How Chinese Consumers Are Transforming Everything,” Karl Gerth outlines China’s growing consumption patterns but then adds an ominous note. He writes, “Nobody fully understands just what they might be sowing, for the Chinese or for the rest of the globe, by continuing to insist that the Chinese consume more and more.”
